visualization_prompt: Generate a column chart showing penguin species abundance using categorical color coding

subtitle.text: Total counts of Palmer Penguin species, from the Palmer Penguins dataset

accessibility.description: Bar chart showing penguin species distribution from Palmer Station Antarctica

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains three categorical variables (penguin species) with one quantitative measure (individual counts). Original data from the Palmer Penguins ecological study maintains research-grade quality with direct field measurements. The column chart maximizes data-ink ratio through Tufte-approved minimal styling, using position and color hue for categorical discrimination. Cairo's perceptual topology is maintained through clear spatial separation and value-labeled columns. Species counts show 45% variance between Adelie (152) and Chinstrap (68), with Gentoo intermediate (124), demonstrating natural population distributions in polar ecosystems.
